summary: A lonely boy who is transferred from his dull life with his adoptive parents to the land where his real father is the King. In that country, he sets out on a quest, together with his new friend, to destroy the evil Knight Kato.
cast: Nick Pickard|Christian Bale|Timothy Bottoms|Susannah York|Christopher Lee|Sverre Anker Ousdal|Igor Yasulovich|Gunilla Nyroos|Linn Stokke|Stig Engström|Geoffrey Staines|Lyubov Germanova|Andrei Petrov|Andrey Sergeev|Denis Bodrov|Anna Foght|William Aldridge|Robin Berglund|Tomas Bolme|Helena Brodin|Crispin Dickson Wendenius|Max Dickson|Lena Endre|Gunnar Ernblad|Åse Fognar|John Harryson|Tor Isedal|Ulf Håkan Jansson|Pontus Lantz|Christoffer Levah|Caroline Löthner|Martin Risler|Johan Rundqvist|Per Sjöstrand|Hans Strååt|Lasse Swärd|Max Winerdahl
title: El príncipe de la tierra de Más allá
